Olga is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offering. In 2010, Olga joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
For over 6 years in Commonwealth, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur, Felipa, a 54-year-old widowed mother of five children, has made a living through the operation of a general store selling a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 8,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Felipa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soap, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (drink powder), shampoo, soap, etc.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 52 years old and married with five children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Carmelita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Carmelita has been raising pigs for five years and also earns additional income from banana retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send all her children to college.

loans.use: To buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Jeune célibataire de 30ans, Mr Kokou est revendeur de carreaux. Il exerce cette activité depuis 04ans dans une boutique et achète les produits à Lomé. Sa difficulté est le retard dans la livraison. Il sollicite un premier crédit de WAGES pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Il veut avec les profits réalisés, passer plus de commande pour élargir son activité. A l’avenir, il voudrait avoir un grand magasin et fonder plus tard un foyer au fruit de l’activité.
texts.en:
Kokou is a young single man. He is 30 years of age and works reselling tiles. He has worked in this business for four years, works in a store, and buys his products in Lomé. The difficulty he faces is delivery delays. 

Kokou has requested his first loan from WAGES to buy supplies of merchandise. With his profits, he wants to process more orders so that he can expand his business. In the future he would like to have a large store, and later to build a home using his business profits.

loans.use: To buy tiles.

loans.name: Biodun

texts.fr: Maré à une couturière, Mr Biodun est un jeune homme de 31ans qui a 01 enfant âgé de 02ans. Il est revendeur et exerce cette activité dans une boutique à toutes personnes. Il commercialise des cartes de recharges, d’habits (friperies) et des jus de fruit en canettes. Il a assez de clients et n’arrivant plus à les supporter à cause du manque d’argent, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES pour augmenter son stock de marchandises. Il veut investir dans une autre activité secondaire et épargner le reste. A l’avenir, il voudrait devenir grossiste pour la vente de cartes de recharges et des jus de fruit en canettes, subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Biodun is a young man aged 31, who is married to a dressmaker and has a 2-year-old child. He works as a reseller in a store, where he sells telephone refill cards, clothing (second-hand) and canned fruit juices to all manner of people. He has a lot of customers and cannot meet all their requests, as he lacks money.

Biodun has requested help from WAGES to increase his supply of merchandise. He wants to invest in a secondary business, and will save the rest of the loan. In the future he would like to become a canned fruit juice and refill card wholesaler, as well as to provide for his family.

loans.use: To buy telephone refill cards, second-hand clothing, and canned fruit juices.

loans.name: Grégoire

texts.fr: Briquetier de profession depuis 2009, Mr Grégoire est père de 06enfants dont 05 scolarisés.(Le premier a 17ans et le dernier 01an). Il est marié à une ménagère et a 40ans. Il étale ses marchandises au bord de la route et ses clients sont plus des entrepreneurs et des maçons. Il est à son premier crédit de WAGES pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de répondre rapidement aux demandes des clients. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, avoir un espace d’expositions de référence et assurer la scolarisation des enfants.
texts.en:
Grégoire has been a brickmaker since 2009, and is the father of six children, five of whom are at school. (His oldest child is 17, while the youngest is 1 year of age). He is married to a homemaker, and is 40 years of age. 

Grégoire lays out his merchandise on the side of the road for sale, and his customers are mostly entrepreneurs and bricklayers. This is his first loan from WAGES, and he plans to use it to buy supplies of merchandise so that he can quickly meet his customers’ requests. He wants to reinvest in his business, have a well-known display space, and provide for his children’s education.

loans.use: To buy bricks.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bakery business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her bakery.

Elsa has been in this business for 30 years. She earns additional income from raising pigs.

Elsa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Kossiwavi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits de mercerie et articles scolaires depuis 1986, Madame Kossiwavi est mariée à un transitaire et ils ont en charge 04enfants  dont 02 à l’école. Elle est âgée de 58ans. Son activité qu’elle exerce se fait dans une boutique et elle est aidée par 03 personnes. Madame Kossiwavi est à son sixième crédit de WAGES. Ce prêt qu’elle sollicite  lui permettra de s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut garantir le bien – être de la famille en santé, nourriture, éducation.
texts.en:
Kossiwavi has worked reselling sewing products and school items since 1986. She is married to a forwarding agent, and they have four children under their care, two of whom are at school. She is 58 years of age. 

Kossiwavi works in a store, and is helped by three people. This is her sixth loan from WAGES, and she has requested the money to buy supplies of merchandise. She wants to ensure her family’s wellbeing and provide for their health, food, and education.

loans.use: To buy sewing products and school items.

loans.name: Anne

texts.fr: Anne est une femme de 47 ans fiancée mère de 8 enfants dont l'age varie entre 10 et 28 ans. Cinq de ses enfants vont encore à l'école. Elle commerçante et vend le bois de chauffage depuis 20 ans déjà. la maîtrise de son activité et son expérience lui sont d'une grande efficacité. elle a conquis et fidélisé une clientèle au fil du temps. Son activé fonctionne mais son capital n'est pas assez important pour qu'elle puisse s'en procurer ses marchandises en grande quantité et pour réaliser un bon bénéfice parce qu'elle son épouse à résoudre certains problèmes quotidiens grâce à cette activité. Grace à ce crédit,elle pourra s'acheter un camion de bois et 50 sacs de charbon ce qui augmentera considérablement son profit. Elle économisera une partie de ce bénéfice pour la scolarisation de ses enfants et réinvestira le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Anne is a 47-year-old engaged mother of eight, whose children range from 10 to 28 years old. Five of her children are still in school. She is a shopkeeper and has been selling firewood for 20 years. Her mastery of her business and her experience make her highly efficient. Over the years, she has gained a loyal customer base. Though her business functions, she doesn't have enough capital to buy large quantities of merchandise and make a large profit because she and her fiancé take care of their everyday issues through this business. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to buy a truckload of wood and 50 bags of coal, which will considerably increase her profit. She will save a portion of this income for her children's education and will invest the rest in her business.

loans.use: to buy a truckload of wood and 50 bags of coal.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a bread business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Marilyn is borrowing 14,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock of bread to sell to her customers.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bread to sell to her customers.

loans.name: 02.04.03 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Hải is applying for a loan to purchase baby poultry and cattle to raise. She works in agriculture raising poultry and cattle.

Hải is 60 years old and married with one child. She is the leader of a three-member group, the 02.04.3 Đông Hải solidarity group. She has no dependents since her child is grown up. 

In 2009, Hải joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hải has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hải has been involved in this business for three years.

The main hardship that Hải faces in her business is the lack of capital. In the future, Hải hopes for her child to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise

loans.name: Berlinda

texts.en: Berlinda is 49 years old from Antequera, Bohol. Her husband is a carpenter. Together, they have four children ages 15, 22, 25 and 32. She is engaged in raising hogs, copra production and basket weaving. Berlinda is asking for a loan to buy feed, buri and rattan so she can increase her production and increase profits for her business. She will then use her loan to further expand her business, provide better meals for her family and pay for school fees.

loans.use: to buy feed, buri and rattan

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en: Cynthia is a 40-year-old mother of three from Antequera, Bohol. Her eldest is 9, and her youngest is 2 years old. Cynthia's husband works as a driver and laborer. She also helps by working as a teacher in a day care center and selling home-cooked snack foods, like pancakes and fried bananas. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients, like flour, margarine, and sugar, so she can maintain her business while meeting the needs of her family. Her income will be used for paying for her children's education and reinvesting in her business.

loans.use: To buy ingredients like flour, margarine, and sugar

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Ms. Yasmeen is a very hardworking lady. She is working to improve the living standard of her family and to meet basic necessities adequately. 

She has been in the business of razai (bed quilt) sewing for the last five years. She usually gets bulk orders from markets, but also receives orders from individual customers. To make an extra contribution towards meeting her household expenses, she wants to increase her business so she contacted Kashf Foundation.

She needs a loan of Rs. 20,000 to expand her business with the purchase of raw materials, e.g., wool, thread, fabric, etc.
 
Yasmeen is 48 years old and she has three children. She is able to send them to good schools for quality education. Her husband is very supportive towards her. That is why she is able to focus on her business growth.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making razai (bed quilts).

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en: Melvin is 40 years old, married, and has seven children. She lives in Lower Tiparak, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Melvin owns and operates a farm where she plants and harvests rice to sell. She has been farming for 20 years. She earns 6,000 PHP a month. Melvin is requesting a loan for 7,000 PHP, which she will use to pay labor costs for land plowing. Melvin has been a member of GDMPC since 2008. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay labor costs for land plowing

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es:
Flor de María tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive junto a su familia en uno de los caseríos que conforman la parte rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, ubicado en la región Piura. La zona solo cuenta con energía eléctrica. 

La actividad que desarrolla es la ganadería, específicamente la cría de ovejas y cabras, las que durante el día libera para que pasten en los campos de cultivos aledaños y en la noche guarda en el corral que nos muestra en la fotografía, una vez que se desarrollan las vende a los negociantes de la zona y a sus vecinos. Cuenta con mas de 3 años de experiencia en el manejo del negocio, ademas se dedica a trabajar en una empresa procesadora de frutas para exportación. Ella es una joven bastante entregada a su familia ya que los ingresos que percibe por sus actividades los utiliza para ayudar a sus padres a quienes quiere y estima demasiado.

Flor de María solicita un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimentos balanceados para que sus animales engorden rápido y puedan ser vendidos ràpidamente y ademas para realizar mejoras en su corral, esta inversión le permitira mejorar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando a su familia a salir adelante. Flor de María agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayudarán con el financiamiento de este préstamo.
texts.en:
Flor de María is 25 years old, single, and has no children.  She lives with her family in one of the neighborhoods that form the rural part of the agricultural district in Tambogrande, located in the region of Piura. This zone has only electricity.

The work she does is in small animal farming, specifically in caring for sheep and goats, which during the day she allows to run free so they can graze in fields on the outskirts of town, and in the nighttime she keeps them in the corral that is shown in the photograph.  Once she has grown them, she sells them to businessmen in the area or to her neighbors.  She has more than three years of experience working in this business, and she also works in a business processing fruits for export.  She is a youth who is very dedicated to her family, and so the income she receives from her activities are used to help her parents, who she loves and admires greatly.

Flor de María is asking for a loan of 2,000 Soles which she thinks to invest in buying balanced feed to fatten her animals quickly, so that they can be sold more quickly, and also to make improvements to her corral.  This investment will gain her a better income and she will continue helping her family to get ahead.  Flor de María is thankful for the hand up from the people who have helped her with the money for this loan.

loans.use: to buy healthy feed for his animals and make improvements on the corrals.

loans.name: Epifanio

texts.es: El señor Epifanio es un hombre alegre que le sonríe a la vida por darle una oportunidad más por salir adelante, Epifanio como a muchas personas les ha pasado ha tenido sus épocas buenas y sus épocas malas y ha salido adelante sin importar lo que se presente, su esposa trabaja al igual que él en una fábrica de la localidad y así solventan sus gastos diarios. El Sr. Epifanio preocupado por su domicilio quiere arreglar el techo por dentro del domicilio y así tener más comodidad en su domicilio que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha sacado adelante.
texts.en:
Epifanio is a happy man with a smile for everyone in life because it has given him the opportunity to get ahead again.  Epifanio, like many people, has had good times and bad ones and has gotten ahead despite whatever stands in his way.  His wife works in the same business as he does, in a factory in his neighborhood to cover their daily expenses. 

Epifanio is worried about his house and wants to make repairs to the roof inside of the house and thus make it more comfortable in his home.  With great strength and dedication, he has become better.

loans.use: to make repairs on the roof of his house.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 34 years old and married with three children.

Jovelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more items like shampoo, soap, sugar, and other groceries.

Jovelyn has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 7 years and also earns an income from raising livestock. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like shampoo, soap, sugar, and other groceries.

loans.name: 3.5.181.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phượng works in the agriculture sector raising food. She is requesting a loan to purchase cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Phượng is 52 years old and married with two children. Phượng is the group leader of the 3.5.181.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of three members. Phượng supports no dependents with her business in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her children are grown up.

In 2010, Phượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Phượng has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Phượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en: Anselma is from Campo 1, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 51 years old, married, and has 10 children. Anselma plants, harvests and sells corn to make a living. She's been in her business for 26 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. In 2011, Anselma joined GDMPC. Anselma is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Iram's Group

texts.en:
Iram, who is a member of this group, has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah to support her clothes selling business.  She purchases clothes at the wholesale market and supplies clothes to shops in her community market.  She also and sells to her neighboring clients.

With the loan Iram will buy clothes in bulk quantity and of a wide variety allowing her to offer more choices to her clients.

Iram has been operating her business for many years and is confident about her business success.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk quantity.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is a 49 year old sari-sari (convenience store) owner from Antequera, Bohol.  

She is married with five children.  Her eldest is 29 and her youngest is 19 years old.  Anecita focuses on her children's education. This inspire her to work hard. 

Anecita is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks, toiletries, snack food, rice and noodles.  An improved inventory will bring more buyers to her store.  With the additional income from the loan Anecita will the finds for school fees and her family's daily consumption.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, toiletries, snack food, rice and noodles.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Ms. Sajida is 42 years old. She is married and has four children. All are getting their education from a good school. 

She is running a business of cotton wastage. Her business details include that she collects cotton wastage from small units and then sells it to comparatively large units where more cotton is extracted from the wastage. 

In her business, her husband fully supports her. This undoubtedly helps her to continue and grow.

Sajida has been working with Kashf Foundation for the last two years. Now she has requested an amount of Rs. 30,000 to buy more cotton wastage.

Sajida has a strong motive to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy cotton wastage for selling wholesale.

loans.name: Emrilita

texts.en:
Emrilita is 63 years old, and is married with 5 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Emrilita has a raffia-making business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 14,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy materials needed for her raffia making.

Emrilita has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her raffia making.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a raffia-making business in the Philippines.

Anecita requested a loan of 23,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business. She has been in this business for 18 years now, and also earns additional income from a general store.

In the future, Anecita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her raffia.

loans.name: Jilma

texts.en:
Jilma works hard to support her family. Jilma is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Jilma requested a PHP 13,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her business.

Jilma has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Jilma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Dante

texts.en:
Dante is 52 years old and married with two children.

Dante works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Dante has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and earns additional income from direct selling of Avon and Natasha products.

Dante aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is married and has three children. Teresita is 46 years old and resides in Balili, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte, Philippines. Teresita own and operates a farm, planting and harvesting rice to sell to earn a living. She's been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure. In 2010, Teresita joined GDMPC. In the future, Teresita wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Aluncia

texts.en:
Aluncia is 59 years old and married with 11 children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Aluncia is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers & other farm supplies.

Aluncia has been farming rice for 10 years and earns additional income from selling gasoline.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to afford to end her children to college.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers & other farm supplies

loans.name: Sajida's Group

texts.en:
Sajida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her brother’s lathe business. He repairs spare parts and iron items with his lathe machine.

With the loan he will buy iron and steel in larger quantity, that will help him in his business.  His customers are very happy with his services and Sajida is hopeful that the loan investment will help him offering better repair services to his clients, and increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy iron and steel in larger quantity.

loans.name: Sreypon's Group

texts.en:
Sreypon is a 33-year-old widow and mother of three dependent daughters, all of whom are in school.  

As a single mother and the breadwinner of the family, she has to struggle to support her family via growing cassava and cashew nuts.  She has been involving in this business for 10 years and currently is able to earn about 11,000 KHR per day.  

Sreypon has had two previous loans with VisionFund and completely repaid them.  The past loans helped her improve her family's standard of living. 

Now Sreypon formed a group of two, herself and Chann- another member who is new to VisionFund and applying a loan of 1,000,000 KHR.  For her as the group leader, she will use her loan of 500,000 KHR, to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor fees for her farmland.  She hopes to grow her cassava and cashew nuts timely so she can earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor fees for her farmland.

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra is married and has seven children.  Her sons work and her daughters remain at home.  Her husband operates a donkey cart and provides loading services to his clients.  He works very hard all the day to earn an income for his family.

Bushra has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the improvement of her husband’s business.  With the loan investment, he will buy a new donkey cart that will allow him to deliver heavier loads and earn more profits from his business.  He has been operating his business for many years and Bushra is confident that his business will improve.

loans.use: To buy a donkey cart for loading services

loans.name: Grimilda Xiomara

texts.es: Grimilda , madre soltera originaria de Condega municipio de Esteli esta agradecida por el primer préstamo Kiva que se le otorgo siendo este de mucho beneficio para ella pues logro invertirlo en compra de mercadería compro ropa , zapatos y bolsos para vender y surtir su negocio. Sus clientes se han sentido muy satisfechos con la calidad de servicio que ofrece, ha crecido un poco su demanda de productos y ve la necesidad de mas inversión. Es por ellos que está solicitando un segundo crédito para la compra de ropa nueva y usada para vender en las comunidades de Estelí donde difícilmente encuentras tiendas y la gente depende de vendedores que visiten a domicilio para poder adquirir mercadería de uso diario. Ella desea ampliar mas  su negocio poner puestos de ropa usada en comunidades donde se necesita ofrecer estos productos. Pero su prioridad principal obtener ingresos para pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Grimilda, a single mother, is a native of the town of Condega in the department of Esteli. She is grateful for her first KIVA loan, which was of great benefit to her since she invested it in the purchase of merchandise, such as clothing, shoes and bags to sell and stock her business. Her customers have been very satisfied with the quality of service she offers and demand for her products has grown a bit. Consequently she sees the need for more investment and is requesting a second loan in order to buy new and used clothing for re-sale in the communities in Estelí where it is difficult to find stores and the people depend on venders, who visit them at their homes, to acquire merchandise for their daily use.

Grimilda wants to expand her business and install stalls for used clothing in communities where there is a need for these products. But her principal priority is to obtain the income to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase new and used clothing.

loans.name: Lerma

texts.en:
Lerma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Lerma has been in this business for 30 years. Lerma earns more income from her tricycle transport business.

Lerma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Wendy Rosa

texts.es: La señora Wendy es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos a su cuidado, ella trabaja como Profesora medio Tiempo en el Colegio Fe y Alegría del municipio de Colcapirhua generando un ingreso de 550 Bs., posee un radio taxi que pudo adquirir con el fruto de sus esfuerzos.  Que se encuentra en buen estado ya que ella le hace mantenimiento periódico, ella percibe de este taxi una renta diaria de 90 Bs. que es manejado por su hermano como chofer. Ella requiere un pequeño préstamo para  hacer refacciones en su humilde casa que está ubicada en una zona periférica de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Para ello recurrió a nuestra institución , quien le facilitó un crédito del proyecto KIVA por lo cual ella está muy agradecida, en especial a  KIVA por canalizar micro préstamos a personas con necesidades económicas que además  les sean de ayuda para mejorar su situación económica y acceder asi a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Wendy is a single mother with two children in her care. She works as a part-time teacher at the Colegio Fe y Alegría in the town of Colcapirhua, generating a salary of 550 Bs.  She owns a radio taxi that she was able to acquire through the fruit of her labor. It is in good condition because she has periodic maintenance done on it. She receives an income of 90 Bs. daily from this taxi, which her brother operates as taxi-driver.

Wendy needs a small loan to refurbish her humble abode which is located in an area peripheral to the city of Cochabamba. She has come to our institution for the loan and we facilitated a KIVA loan for her and she is very grateful, especially to KIVA for channeling micro loans to people with economic needs who can use them to help improve their economic situation and gain access to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to refurbish her house.

loans.name: Nataly Paola

texts.es:
Nataly tiene 21 años de edad, es una persona joven y muy humilde que se dedica a estudiar y trabajar. Nataly, es comerciante de verduras, y carne, tiene un pequeño puesto en la puerta de la vivienda de sus padres. Atiende a una clientela variada, su horario de trabajo comienza desde las 5:30 A.M. y termina alrededor de  las 11:00AM, por las tardes colabora con uno de sus tíos como secretaria y por las noches se dedica a estudiar. El diario vivir de Nataly es muy agotador, ella lucha día a día para llegar a tener un futuro mejor. 
Nataly quiere tener mas clientela por ello necesita un poco de dinero para comprar abarrotes y poder venderlos en su pequeño puesto de venta. Élla está muy agradecido con la gente que por medio de Kiva le pudo dar la oportunidad de mejorar su negocio y de esa manera pueda mejorar su nivel de vida en un futuro próximo.
Nataly en sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Nataly, age 21, is a very humble young person who goes to school and works.  Nataly sells vegetables and meat.  She has a small stand at the door to her parents’ house.  She tends to a varied clientele.  Her work schedule starts at 5:30 a.m. and ends around 11:00 a.m.  In the afternoons she works with one of her uncles as a secretary, and she goes to school at night.  Nataly’s daily life is very exhausting.  She struggles day to day to be able to have a better future.

Nataly wants to have more customers, and to get them she needs a little money to buy groceries to sell at her small stand.  She is very grateful to the people who, through Kiva, were able to give her the opportunity to improve her business.  This way she will be able to improve her standard of living in the near future.

Nataly’s plan for the future is to take a new loan in order to be able to continue with her education.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell at her small stand.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
Cirila tiene 25 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos pequeños, ella es una persona joven y trabajadora. Cirila, cría ganado para producir leche cruda de buena calidad. Su trabajo consiste en alimentar al ganado todos los días, entre 2 a 3 veces por día, tiene que levantarse a las 4 de la mañana para ordeñar a sus vacas, durante el día las limpia, hace mantenimiento a su corral y también atiende a sus pequeños hijos. Por las noches también tiene que volver a ordeñar.
Cirila necesita comprar forraje para alimentar a su ganado puesto que en su localidad el invierno ya llego y existe escases de alimento, para seguir produciendo leche y de esa manera no disminuyan sus ingresos ella necesita el crédito. Élla está muy agradecido con la gente que por medio de Kiva le pudo dar la oportunidad de seguir adelante con su negocio y de esta manera pueda seguir manteniendo a su familia.
Cirila en sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar más vacas lecheras.
texts.en:
Cirila is 25 years old and has two small children. She is a young, hardworking person. She raises cattle to produce good quality raw milk. Her work consists of feeding her cattle every day, between two and three times a day. She has to get up at 4 in the morning to milk her cows. During the day she cleans them, cleans their corral and also takes care of her children. At night she also has to go and milk the cows again.

Cirila needs to buy forage to feed her cattle since winter has already arrived in her area and there is little to feed them with so they can continue producing milk and her income will not drop. Thus, she needs the loan. She is very grateful to the people who, through Kiva, gave her the opportunity to continue moving forward with her business, since this is how she can continue supporting her family. Cirila’s future plans are to take out a new loan to purchase more dairy cows.

loans.use: to buy fodder for her cows.

loans.name: José Bartolo

texts.es:
Don José Bartolo, tiene la edad de 54 años, casado, reside en el departamento de Masaya, de oficio carpintero,  tiene de experiencia 21 años, pero desde hace 15 años adquirió su negocio, ya que el necesitaba independizarse y darse a conocer en el mercado, tanto así que hoy en día el tiene su propio taller y su clientela fija, también se ha ido perfeccionado de tal manera que su producto va adquiriendo mas mano de obra calificada. Actualmente esta necesitando invertirle de materiales en su negocio por lo que se presenta a nuestra oficina Ceprodel para requerir de un préstamo del cual pueda comprar los siguientes madera cedro, laurel, sellador, sener, lija #40, 80, 100,180, pega lanco, #2, pega resistol, tornillo, tornillo, clavos, esponja para tapizar, tela para tapizar, pega amarilla.

De tal manera que le pueda ir aumentando mas su negocio,  mayores ingresos y mejor calidad de vida para el y su familia.
texts.en:
José Bartolo, 54, is married and lives in Masaya Department.  He’s a carpenter with 21 years’ experience but has had his own business for 15 years because he needed to become independent and make himself known in the marketplace.  Today, he has his own workshop and a regular clientele.  He’s also been honing his skills to such an extent that his products are better made.  

He needs to invest in supplies for his business which is why he’s come by the Ceprodel offices to request a loan to buy the following: cedar and laurel wood, sealer, thinner, sandpaper # 40, 80, 100 and 180, white #2 glue, Resistol plastic cement, screws, nails, upholstery foam, upholstery fabric, yellow carpenter’s glue so that he can continue expanding the business, increasing income and improving his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy furniture-making supplies.

loans.name: Carlos Horacio

texts.es: Carlos, es padre de familia, habitante de la ciudad de Estelí de oficio mecánico y también hace trabajos de soldadura tiene 5 hijos. Este oficio lo aprendió a la edad de 12 años comenzó reparando y soldando bicicletas y motos junto con su padre de esto sobrevivían. Después puso una pequeña pulpería la cual es administrada por su esposa mientras él se dedica a la reparación de vehículos y motos. El está requiriendo el préstamo para compra de herramientas y cascos de motocicletas para vender. Pues le gustaría diversificar su negocio y no solo ofrecer sus servicios también ofrecer artículos de protección vehicular, pues su meta es ampliar su negocio y darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is a father living in Estelí.  He’s a mechanic by profession and also does welding jobs.  He has five children.  He learned his occupation at the age of 12 repairing and welding bicycles and motorcycles alongside his father; this is how they supported themselves.  Later on, he opened a small grocery store his wife runs while he works repairing vehicles and motorcycles.

He needs a loan to buy tools and motorcycle helmets to sell because he’d like to diversify his business and not just offer services but also vehicle safety products because his goal is to expand the business and give his children a good education.

loans.use: to buy tools and motorcycle helmets.

loans.name: Ghazala's Group

texts.en:
Ghazala is the mother of five sons and two daughters. Her eldest son is a dental expert who runs a dental clinic, while her remaining children are continuing their education. An embroidery expert, Ghazala prepares beautiful embroidered clothes for her clients and earns reasonable income every month.

Ghazala has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for further expansion of her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy beads and embroidery thread in larger quantity and variety that will help her prepare even better looking clothes and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy embroidery materials for her business.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es:
Rufina tiene 47 años de edad, es separada y tiene dos hijos dependientes. Vive en casa propia, con  sus dos hijos. La comunidad en donde reside forma parte del área rural del distrito de Tambogrande y ya cuenta con servicio basico de luz electrica. 

La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de abarrotes, bebidas y golosinas desde hace dos años, lo cual le ha hecho conocida en la zona y actualmente cuenta con una clientela estable. Ademas se dedica a la crianza de cerdos los cuales compra desde pequeños para engordarlos y venderlos, contando con amplia experiencia. 

Rufina se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 2500 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de más mercadería para su bodega, especialmente artículos de primera necesidad, bebidas y golosinas, además desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus animales. Con esta inversion ella podrá brindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y podrá sacarlos adelante.

Rufina cuenta con grandes deseos de superación y crecimiento como empresaria y como madre soltera. Sus hijos son su razón de ser y por ellos se esfuerza todos los días, nada la hará mas feliz que verlos convertidos en hombres de bien. Ella agradece de antemano el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Rufina, 47, is separated and has two dependent children.  She lives in her own house with her two children.  The community she lives in belongs to the rural part of Tambogrande District that already has electricity.

The activity she carries out is selling groceries, soft-drinks and snacks; she’s been in business two years which has made her well-known in the zone and she currently has a stable clientele.  She also raises pigs that she buys when they are little to fatten up and then sell; she has ample experience.

Rufina is asking for a 2500 new sol loan to buy more merchandise for her store, especially basic staple items, soft-drinks and snacks.  She also wants to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.  With this investment she will be able to provide her children with a better quality of life and be able to move them forward.

Rufina very much wants to get ahead and to grow as a businesswoman and as a single mother.  Her children are her reason to live and she strives for them daily.  Nothing would make her happier than to see them become upstanding citizens.  She gives thanks in advance for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store and also to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей женат. У него двое взрослых детей.

Сергей работал шахтером, но теперь он на пенсии. Сейчас Сергей помогает жене с бизнесом и работает на дачном участке. Ему очень нравится работать с землей. Сергей собирается заниматься фермерством в большем объеме. С одной стороны это хобби, с другой - возможность съэкономить пенсионные средства, выращивая продукты самостоятельно.

Сергей просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 5000 гривен на покупку мотоблока для дачного участка.
texts.en: Sergei is married and has two adult children.  He used to work as a miner and is now retired.  Currently, Sergei helps his wife with the business and works in the garden.  He likes to work with the land very much.  Sergei plans to get involved in farming on a large scale.  From one perspective, this is a hobby, and from another - it is a possibility to save retirement funds by growing products independently.  Sergei is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 hryvnia to purchase a mechanized farming equipment for his garden plot.

loans.use: to buy mechanized farming equipment for his garden

loans.name: Luz Yessenia

texts.es: LUZ YESSENIA TIENE 38 AÑOS DE EDAD,SOLTERA SIN HIJOS Y VIVE CON SU MADRE A QUIEN CUIDA Y AYUDA CON SUS TAREAS DIARIAS. VIVEN EN UNA COMUNIDAD GRANDE EN LA  ZONA URBANA DE CAYALTI. LUZ HA DEMONSTRADO SER UNA PERSONA EMPREDENDORA QUE PIENSA DISTINTO A LA MAYORIA EN SU PUEBLO. ELLA SE DIO CUENTA DE WL POTENTIAL QUE TIENEN LOS NEGOCIOS PARA DIVERTIR A LOS NIÑOS Y LOS JUEGOS ELECTRONICOS. POR ESO ELLA SE DEDICA A BRINDAR SERVICIO DE PLAY STATION Y A LA VENTA DE PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA,DESDE HACE  MAS DE 10 AÑOS,EN SU PROPIO DOMICILIO. SU IDEA A DEMONSTRADO SER MUY BENEFICIOSA PARA ELLA Y SU MADRE.APARTE, TAMBIEN HA ESTADO INVIRTIENDO EN PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA PARA LA VENTA, LA CUAL TAMBIEN ESTA PROGRASANDO Y VA EN BUENA DIRECCION. PRECISAMENTE SOLICITA  PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE UN NUEVO PLAY STATION  Y EN LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA,DE ESTA MANERA  HACER CRECER SU NEGOCIO Y PODER MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE  VIDA.
texts.en: Luz Yessenia is 38 years old, single with no children. She lives with her mother, whom she cares for and helps with daily tasks.  She lives in a large community within the Cayalti urban area.  Luz has demonstrated herself to be an entrepreneurial person who thinks differently than most of the people in her town.  She realized there was potential for a business to amuse children with electronic games.  Therefore, she decided to offer a Sony PlayStation game service and sell beauty products, which she has been doing for the past ten years, operating out of her home.  Her idea has proven to be very beneficial for her and her mother.  She has also been investing in an inventory of beauty products for resale, which has been progressing and going well.  It is precisely for this that she is requesting a loan in order to buy a new PlayStation and beauty products in order to grow her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a new PlayStation and beauty products for resale

loans.name: Menandro

texts.es:
Menandro es un padre de familia de 26 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y a un hijo en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, la comunidad en donde reside solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica.

La actividad que desarrolla es la ganaderia, especialmente de ovinos y de aves de corral, ademas se dedica a la agricultura, el tiene instalado el cultivo de limon que cosecha semanalmente, actualmente cuenta con mas de tres años de experiencia en estas actividades.

Menandro se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimentos para sus animales, de modo que se desarrollen de un mejor modo y puedan ser vendidos a un mejor precio, ademas desea comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de limon, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida. El agradece de antemano el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Menandro’s a 26-year-old father living with his wife and son in one of the hamlets that forms part of the Tambogrande agricultural district.  The community he lives in only has electricity.

The activity he carries out is animal husbandry, especially sheep and barnyard fowl.  He also farms.  He grows lemons that he harvests weekly.  He currently has more than three years’ experience in these activities.

Menandro is asking for a 1000 new sol loan to buy animal feed so that they will develop better and can be sold at a better price.  He also wants to buy fertilizer for his lemon crops that will make it possible for him to improve his quality of life.  He gives thanks in advance for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to buy fertilizer for his lemon crops.

loans.name: Katherine Janet

texts.es:
Katherine tiene 31 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos de cuatro y doce años en hogar propio, situado en la localidad de Cayalti, a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, en su comunidad comúnmente se dedican a la comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Katherine se dedica a venta y crianza de animales menores y aves de corral, ella cría gallinas, patos, pavos y cerdos en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a las personas interesadas  de la zona en donde reside. 

Katherine desea adquirir más animales para ampliar su negocio, así como alimentos para sus animales , por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles de modo que pueda alcanzar sus objetivos

Katherine es una madre bastante entregada a su familia y siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que la conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño. Ella ya ha tenido un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y gracias a ello pudo sacar adelante su negocio y a su familia, por ello agradece a las personas que le ayudaron en su momento y también agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayudarán en esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Katherine, 31, is married living with her husband and children who are 4 and 12 years of age in her own home located in Cayalti an hour away from the city of Chiclayo; for the most part people in her community are merchants, farmers and raise livestock.

Katherine raises small farm animals and barnyard fowl to sell.  She raises chickens, ducks, turkeys and pigs in her back yard and when they reach a good level of development she sells them to interested parties in the zone where she lives.

Katherine wants to buy more animals for her business as well as animal feed for them which is why she’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to reach her goals.

Katherine is quite dedicated to her family and is always watchful of their wellbeing and development.  People who know her hold her in high esteem and affection.  She’s had a previous loan financed through Kiva and thanks to it was able to move her business and her family forward for which she is grateful to the people who helped her at that time and she also gives anticipated thanks to those who will help her on this occasion.

loans.use: to buy more animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Natasha

texts.ru:
Наталия уже несколько раз пользовалась кредитами КИВА. Благодаря предыдущим кредитам Наталия смогла привести купленный ею магазин в такое состояние, что все помещения в нем смогла сдать в аренду. Однако Наталия столкнулась с многими лишними затратами во время оформления документов на магазин. 
В этот раз Наталия хочет вложить полученные финансовые средства в 5 000 гривен в приобретение сумок для увеличения ассортимента товара под реализацию. За счет увеличения ассортимента товара Наталия надеется расширить круг покупателей и оборот, а это улучшит жизнь ее семьи.
texts.en: Natalia has used Kiva loans several times already.  Thanks to her previous loans, she was able to bring the store she bought to such good order that she could rent out all of its space.  However, Natalia came face-to-face with excess expenses while processing the paperwork for the store.  This time, she wants to invest the obtained financial amount of 5,000 hryvnia into a purchase of purses in order to expand her merchandise selection for sale.  Natalia hopes to expand her customer base and increase goods turnover by expanding her merchandise selection, which would improve her family's life.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of purses

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Del Barrio San Pedro Group

texts.es:
Este grupo Mujeres Emprendedoras del Barrio San Pedro surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, trabajan con la fundación desde el año 2005,  y gracias a su esfuerzo ya se encuentran  en el ciclo 23.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Ana ella se dedica  a la  venta productos de limpieza y a la venta de comidas, es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo emprendedora, que desea poder sobresalir y de esa forma ayudar a su familia.
La Sra. Ana solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para que pueda seguir haciendo sus comestibles y también productos de limpieza para la venta.
texts.en:
This group of enterprising women from the San Pedro neighborhood arose through the contact of one of the members with the Fundación; it’s worked with the Fundación since 2005 and thanks to their efforts are now in cycle 23.

One of the group members is Ana.  She sells cleaning supplies and food.  She’s a very hardworking and above all enterprising person who wants to stand out and help her family that way.

Ana is asking for the loan to buy ingredients to continue making her food and also to buy cleaning supplies to resell.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and cleaning supplies.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un padre de familia de 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y a sus 2 hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, en la región Piura.

La actividad que desarrolla es la agricultura, ha sembrado plantaciones de limon y mango en un terreno agricola de una hectárea que es herencia de su padre, el trabaja parte del tiempo en el campo y ademas se dedica al servicio de transporte en su mototaxi atendiendo a los pobladores de la zona, Pedro cuenta con mas de ocho años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio.

Pedro se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón de modo que pueda lograr una mejor producción, con estos ingresos podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Pedroo agradece de antemano el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Pedro, 34, is a father living with his wife and two children in one of the settlements that forms the rural part of the agricultural Tambogrande District in Piura Region.  His activity is agriculture.  He’s planted lemons and mangoes on a one-hectare parcel of farmland he inherited from his father.  He works part of the time in his fields and part of the time providing mototaxi transportation services to local residents.  Pedro has more than 8 years’ experience running his business.

Pedro is asking for a 3,000 new sol loan to buy fertilizer for his lemon crop so that he can attain better yields with income from which he will be able to improve his and his family’s quality of life.  Pedro gives thanks in advance for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his lemon crop.

loans.name: Saima's Group

texts.en:
Saima is married and has three sons. All of them are enrolled in a nearby school getting their education. Saima is a housewife. She performs her household duties by staying at home.

Her husband operates a flour selling business. He has a wheat grinding machine and he sells good quality flour to his clients for a low price. Saima has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for further expansion of her husband’s business. With the loan investment he will buy wheat in larger quantities so he can make flour. He is very experienced in his business and has been operating it for the past many years. Saima is confident that the loan will help him to be more productive and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: To buy wheat for making flour

loans.name: Philomaine

texts.fr: Philomène est une jeune femme de 39 ans célibataire mère d'un enfant âgé de 5 ans qui va déjà à l'école. Elle a ouvert et gère un bar-restaurant depuis 3 trois dans un quartier de la place. Son ancienneté et sa forte expérience dans ce domaine lui ont permis d’acquérir une clientèle fidèle. Mais son petit capital ne lui permet de bien gérer toute cette clientèle à cause des ruptures permanentes de stocks parce qu'elle achète en petites quantité. ce crédit lui permettra d'acheter plusieurs casiers de boissons hygiéniques  et un stock important de denrées alimentaires. Elle épargnera une partie du bénéfice qu'elle aura pour agrandir son activité en achetant plus de boisson et le reste l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Philomaine is a young, 39-year-old single mother of a 5-year-old child, who is already at school. Three years ago she opened and started to run a bar-restaurant in a neighborhood of her town. Her time in this business and her significant experience have allowed her to obtain a loyal customer base. Nevertheless, her small amount of capital does not allow her to manage these customers very well, as there are constant stock shortages because she buys in small quantities.

This loan will allow Philomaine to buy several crates of hygienic drinks, as well as a significant stock of staple foodstuffs. She will save part of her profits to expand her business by buying more drinks, and will use the rest to provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy several crates of drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy boxes of smoked fish.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
Kuña Rory gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo están ya en el ciclo numero 20. Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Mercedes ella  tiene una ferretería en su casa, y cuenta que ya tiene muy buena clientela, pues su negocio es muy bien surtido.
La Sra. Mercedes es una persona muy emprendedora y que gracias a su esfuerzo y también a fundación paraguaya y su grupo de amigas está saliendo.
Mercedes solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para su ferretería, como ser herramientas, pinturas y demás, para poder surtir bien su negocio.
texts.en:
Thanks to their effort and work, Kuña Rory is now in its cycle #20.  One of the group members is Mercedes who has a home-based hardware store.  She relates that she already has a well-established clientele because her business is very well-stocked.

Mercedes is a very enterprising person who thanks to her efforts, to Fundación Paraguaya and to support from her group is getting ahead.  She’s asking for a loan to buy supplies like tools, paint and others for her hardware store in order to stock it well.

loans.use: to buy tools, paint and others.

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
Este comité es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo, las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas y también el crecimiento de sus familias.
La Sra. Noelia, presidenta del grupo, es una mujer casada, activa y promueve el fortalecimiento del comité. Es una persona muy trabajadora y desea salir adelante, ella se dedica a las ventas de todo tipo, y solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, fideos, carne, leche, panificados, arroz, bebidas, aceite, harina, etc, y de esa forma seguir trabajando y saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
This committee is from the city of San Lorenzo.  The group members set as their main goal their individual growth as well as their families’ growth.
Noelia is group president.  She’s married, active and fosters the committee’s strengthening.  She is a very hardworking person who wants to get ahead.  She sells all types of things and needs the loan to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, baked goods, rice, beverages, oil, flour, etc. in order to continue working and getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Noé

texts.es:
Noé tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive junto a sus padres en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito agrícola Tambogrande, en la región Piura.

La actividad que desarrolla es el servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en su mototaxi, con la que recorre los caseríos transportando pasajeros. Cuenta con todos sus documentos en regla. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, los cuales al alcanzar peso y tamaño ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Noé tiene más de 2 años de experiencia en sus actividades

Noé se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que piensa inverir en la reparación y mantenimiento de su de su mototaxi. Sus mayores anhelos son poder reunir el dinero suficiente para estudiar y conseguir un mejor trabajo.El agradece de antemano el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Noé, 19, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in one of the settlements that form the rural part of the agricultural Tambogrande District in Piura Region.

His activity is providing cargo and passenger transportation services in his mototaxi throughout the settlements.  All of his documentation is in order.  He also raises sheep that he sells in the local market when they reach ideal size and weight.  Noé has more than two years’ experience in his activities.

Noé is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to repair and service his mototaxi.  His greatest dream is to save up enough money to be able to study and get a better job.  He gives thanks in advance for the support provided.

loans.use: to service and repair his mototaxi.

loans.name: Reynerio

texts.es:
Reynerio, es un sencillo campesino, originario de la comarca Santa Cruz en las afueras de la Esteli, se dedica a la siembra de repollo, papas, chiltomas que son los productos mas populares que se siembran en esa zona debido a sus tierras fértiles y aptas para este tipo de siembras . E l junto con su familia trabajan j las tierras para poder sembrar y producir , comercializan sus cultivos en las carreteras y a compradores que buscan en la  comunidad sus frescos productos.
El necesita el préstamo para sembrar 11/2 manzana de repollo. Pues con el crédito podrá comprar insumos para siembra como semilla, abonos, fertilizantes, espera sacar una producción de mucha calidad y buen rendimiento que le permita mejorar sus ingresos y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Reynerio is a simple farmer from the Santa Cruz district outside Estelí.  He grows cabbage, potatoes and peppers that are the most popular crops in the region due to the fertile soil apt for this type of crop.  He and his family work the land together in order to plant and produce.  They sell their crops along the highways and to buyers who come by the community looking for fresh products.

He needs the loan in order to plant 1-1/2 manzanas [Central American unit of land measurement] of cabbage.  The loan will make it possible for him to buy seeds, manure and fertilizer.  He hopes for a very high quality, high yield harvest that will allow him to improve his income and give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.
